---
title: "Geographic Barrier Data Download"
---


```{=html}

<table>
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>Name</th>
      <th>Unit of Analysis</th>
      <th>Description</th>
      <th>Download</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>Raw Dataset</td>
      <td>country<sub>i</sub>-country<sub>j</sub>-latitude-longitude-year</td>
      <td>
        The raw spatial dataset, where the NASA observations are aggregated to the yearly level for particular locations at country borders.
      </td>
      <td><a href="/datasets/raw_geo_bar.dta" download>Download</a></td>
    </tr>

    <tr>
      <td>Directed Dyad Dataset</td>
      <td>country<sub>i</sub>-country<sub>j</sub>-year</td>
      <td>
        A non-spatial dataset that includes aggregated values of geographic barriers and border infrastructure at the directed-dyad-year level.
      </td>
      <td><a href="/datasets/ddirected_geo_bar.dta" download>Download</a></td>
    </tr>

    <tr>
      <td>Monadic Dataset</td>
      <td>country<sub>i</sub>-year</td>
      <td>
        A non-spatial dataset where the geographic variables and border infrastructure variables are aggregated to the country-year level.
      </td>
      <td><a href="/datasets/monadic_geo_bar.dta" download>Download</a></td>
    </tr>

    <tr>
      <td>Between Dataset</td>
      <td>country<sub>i</sub>-country<sub>j</sub>-latitude-longitude</td>
      <td>
        A spatial dataset where the geographic variables and border infrastructure variables are aggregated across time.
      </td>
      <td><a href="/datasets/between_geo_bar.dta" download>Download</a></td>
    </tr>


  </tbody>
</table>
```
